description: Try our easy to follow Sweet Wreath recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Meringue,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Halal,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Sweet Wreath Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: You will need 1/2 a quantity of shortbread dough for this recipe. Preheat oven to 160Â°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Prepare shortbread mixture and roll out to 4mm thick. Cut out rounds using fluted 4.5cm and plain 3cm cutters.
Transfer to tray and bake 8-10 minutes or until pale golden. Transfer to a wire rack and cool completely.

Meanwhile, beat butter until creamy. Beat in icing sugar until smooth. Stir in milk. Spread half the biscuits with a little jam and remainder with buttercream. Sandwich together. Arrange biscuits, meringues, crushed meringues, strawberries and leaves in a wreath shape on a large board. Dust with icing sugar and scatter with mint and serve.
